Aggro Druid (Standard) deck list and gui.name: Aggro Druid (Standard) deck list and guide - Hearthstone - July 2016

moltengiant.name: Molten Giant
moltengiant.description: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
moltengiant.flavorText: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

mountaingiant.name: Mountain Giant
mountaingiant.description: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
mountaingiant.flavorText: His mother said that he was just big boned.

anyfincanhappen.name: Anyfin Can Happen
anyfincanhappen.description: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
anyfincanhappen.flavorText: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.

doom!.name: DOOM!
doom!.description: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
doom!.flavorText: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

mindcontrol.name: Mind Control
mindcontrol.description: Take control of an enemy minion.
mindcontrol.flavorText: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

pyroblast.name: Pyroblast
pyroblast.flavorText: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

cthun.name: C'Thun
cthun.description: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
cthun.flavorText: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.

deathwing.name: Deathwing
deathwing.description: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
deathwing.flavorText: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

deathwingdragonlord.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
deathwingdragonlord.description: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
deathwingdragonlord.flavorText: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

facelessbehemoth.name: Faceless Behemoth
facelessbehemoth.flavorText: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

frostgiant.name: Frost Giant
frostgiant.description: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
frostgiant.flavorText: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

nzoththecorruptor.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
nzoththecorruptor.description: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
nzoththecorruptor.flavorText: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

seagiant.name: Sea Giant
seagiant.description: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.

varianwrynn.name: Varian Wrynn
varianwrynn.description: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
varianwrynn.flavorText: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

yogg-saronhopesend.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
yogg-saronhopesend.description: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
yogg-saronhopesend.flavorText: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

yshaarjrageunbound.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
yshaarjrageunbound.description: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
yshaarjrageunbound.flavorText: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
alexstrasza.description: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
alexstrasza.flavorText: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

anubarak.name: Anub'arak
anubarak.description: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
anubarak.flavorText: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

arch-thiefrafaam.name: Arch-Thief Rafaam
arch-thiefrafaam.flavorText: He's very good at retrieving artifacts.  From other people's museums.

aviana.name: Aviana
aviana.flavorText: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

bladeofcthun.name: Blade of C'Thun
bladeofcthun.description: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to_your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
bladeofcthun.flavorText: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

bloodoftheancientone.name: Blood of The Ancient One
bloodoftheancientone.description: If you control two of theseat the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
bloodoftheancientone.flavorText: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

cenarius.name: Cenarius
cenarius.description: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
cenarius.flavorText: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

icehowl.name: Icehowl
icehowl.flavorText: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

kingkrush.name: King Krush
kingkrush.flavorText: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you donâ€™t like standing in front of you.

lordjaraxxus.name: Lord Jaraxxus
lordjaraxxus.description: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
lordjaraxxus.flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

majordomoexecutus.name: Majordomo Executus
majordomoexecutus.description: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros, the Firelord.
majordomoexecutus.flavorText: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.

malygos.name: Malygos
malygos.flavorText: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

nefarian.name: Nefarian
nefarian.description: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
nefarian.flavorText: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.

northseakraken.name: North Sea Kraken
northseakraken.flavorText: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

nozdormu.name: Nozdormu
nozdormu.description: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
nozdormu.flavorText: Time to write some flavor text.

onyxia.name: Onyxia
onyxia.description: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
onyxia.flavorText: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

soggoththeslitherer.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
soggoththeslitherer.description: TauntCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
soggoththeslitherer.flavorText: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

volcaniclumberer.name: Volcanic Lumberer
volcaniclumberer.description: TauntCosts (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
volcaniclumberer.flavorText: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!

ysera.name: Ysera
ysera.description: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
ysera.flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

callofthewild.name: Call of the Wild
callofthewild.flavorText: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

twistingnether.name: Twisting Nether
twistingnether.flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

alakirthewindlord.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
alakirthewindlord.flavorText: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

anomalus.name: Anomalus
anomalus.description: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.

chromaggus.name: Chromaggus
chromaggus.description: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
chromaggus.flavorText: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.

doomcaller.name: Doomcaller
doomcaller.description: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
doomcaller.flavorText: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

eldritchhorror.name: Eldritch Horror
eldritchhorror.flavorText: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

fossilizeddevilsaur.name: Fossilized Devilsaur
fossilizeddevilsaur.description: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.
fossilizeddevilsaur.flavorText: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.

giantsandworm.name: Giant Sand Worm
giantsandworm.description: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
giantsandworm.flavorText: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

grommashhellscream.name: Grommash Hellscream
grommashhellscream.flavorText: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

gruul.name: Gruul
gruul.description: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
gruul.flavorText: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle themâ€¦ he never meant toâ€¦

ragnarosthefirelord.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
ragnarosthefirelord.description: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
ragnarosthefirelord.flavorText: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesnâ€™t work out the way you want it to.

ragnaroslightlord.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
ragnaroslightlord.description: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
ragnaroslightlord.flavorText: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

rhonin.name: Rhonin
rhonin.description: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.

theboogeymonster.name: The Boogeymonster
theboogeymonster.description: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
theboogeymonster.flavorText: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

tirionfordring.name: Tirion Fordring
tirionfordring.description: Divine Shield. Taunt. Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
tirionfordring.flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

gladiatorslongbow.name: Gladiator's Longbow
gladiatorslongbow.description: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
gladiatorslongbow.flavorText: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

gorehowl.name: Gorehowl
gorehowl.description: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
gorehowl.flavorText: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

everyfinisawesome.name: Everyfin is Awesome
everyfinisawesome.description: Give your minions +2/+2.Costs (1) less for each Murloc you control.
everyfinisawesome.flavorText: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!

flamestrike.name: Flamestrike
flamestrike.description: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions.
flamestrike.flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

wispsoftheoldgods.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
wispsoftheoldgods.description: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
wispsoftheoldgods.flavorText: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

acidmaw.name: Acidmaw
acidmaw.description: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
acidmaw.flavorText: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

ancientoflore.name: Ancient of Lore
ancientoflore.description: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.
ancientoflore.flavorText: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

ancientofwar.name: Ancient of War
ancientofwar.description: Choose One -+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
ancientofwar.flavorText: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

ancientshieldbearer.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
ancientshieldbearer.description: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
ancientshieldbearer.flavorText: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

archmageantonidas.name: Archmage Antonidas
archmageantonidas.description: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
archmageantonidas.flavorText: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

barongeddon.name: Baron Geddon
barongeddon.description: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
barongeddon.flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

bogcreeper.name: Bog Creeper
bogcreeper.flavorText: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

capturedjormungar.name: Captured Jormungar
capturedjormungar.flavorText: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

chillmaw.name: Chillmaw
chillmaw.description: TauntDeathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
chillmaw.flavorText: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

chogall.name: Cho'gall
chogall.description: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
chogall.flavorText: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

confessorpaletress.name: Confessor Paletress
confessorpaletress.description: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
confessorpaletress.flavorText: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

corehound.name: Core Hound
corehound.flavorText: You donâ€™t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

eadricthepure.name: Eadric the Pure
eadricthepure.description: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions'Attack to 1.
eadricthepure.flavorText: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

fearsomedoomguard.name: Fearsome Doomguard
fearsomedoomguard.flavorText: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

grotesquedragonhawk.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
grotesquedragonhawk.flavorText: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

guardianofkings.name: Guardian of Kings
guardianofkings.description: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
guardianofkings.flavorText: Holy beings from the beyond are so clichÃ©!

hoggerdoomofelwynn.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
hoggerdoomofelwynn.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
hoggerdoomofelwynn.flavorText: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

knightofthewild.name: Knight of the Wild
knightofthewild.description: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
knightofthewild.flavorText: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

malkorok.name: Malkorok
malkorok.flavorText: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

obsidiandestroyer.name: Obsidian Destroyer
obsidiandestroyer.description: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
obsidiandestroyer.flavorText: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!

prophetvelen.name: Prophet Velen
prophetvelen.description: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
prophetvelen.flavorText: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

ravenholdtassassin.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
ravenholdtassassin.flavorText: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

rendblackhand.name: Rend Blackhand
rendblackhand.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
rendblackhand.flavorText: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.

skycapnkragg.name: Skycap'n Kragg
skycapnkragg.description: CharrrrrgeCosts (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
skycapnkragg.flavorText: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

stormwindchampion.name: Stormwind Champion
stormwindchampion.flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

twinemperorveklor.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
twinemperorveklor.description: [x]TauntBattlecry: If your C'Thun hasat least 10 Attack, summonanother Emperor.
twinemperorveklor.flavorText: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

wargolem.name: War Golem
wargolem.flavorText: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

avengingwrath.name: Avenging Wrath
avengingwrath.description: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
avengingwrath.flavorText: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
blizzard.flavorText: This spell can be very Entertaining.

darkbargain.name: Dark Bargain
darkbargain.description: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
darkbargain.flavorText: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

enterthecoliseum.name: Enter the Coliseum
enterthecoliseum.description: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
enterthecoliseum.flavorText: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

entomb.name: Entomb
entomb.description: Choose an enemy minion.Shuffle it into your deck.
entomb.flavorText: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.

holyfire.name: Holy Fire
holyfire.description: Deal 5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

siphonsoul.name: Siphon Soul
siphonsoul.description: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
siphonsoul.flavorText: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

starfire.name: Starfire
starfire.flavorText: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

thistletea.name: Thistle Tea
thistletea.description: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
thistletea.flavorText: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

ancientharbinger.name: Ancient Harbinger
ancientharbinger.description: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
ancientharbinger.flavorText: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

archmage.name: Archmage
archmage.flavorText: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

argentcommander.name: Argent Commander
argentcommander.flavorText: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

bolframshield.name: Bolf Ramshield
bolframshield.description: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
bolframshield.flavorText: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

boulderfistogre.name: Boulderfist Ogre
boulderfistogre.flavorText: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

cabalshadowpriest.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
cabalshadowpriest.description: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
cabalshadowpriest.flavorText: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

cairnebloodhoof.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
cairnebloodhoof.flavorText: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

coldarradrake.name: Coldarra Drake
coldarradrake.description: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
coldarradrake.flavorText: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

corruptedseer.name: Corrupted Seer
corruptedseer.description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
corruptedseer.flavorText: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

darkarakkoa.name: Dark Arakkoa
darkarakkoa.flavorText: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

drakonidcrusher.name: Drakonid Crusher
drakonidcrusher.description: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
drakonidcrusher.flavorText: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humaniod. But, like, why?

dreadinfernal.name: Dread Infernal
dreadinfernal.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
dreadinfernal.flavorText: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

emperorthaurissan.name: Emperor Thaurissan
emperorthaurissan.description: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
emperorthaurissan.flavorText: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

facelesssummoner.name: Faceless Summoner
facelesssummoner.flavorText: They never get the recognition they deserve.

fireelemental.name: Fire Elemental
fireelemental.flavorText: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

frostelemental.name: Frost Elemental
frostelemental.flavorText: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

gadgetzanauctioneer.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
gadgetzanauctioneer.description: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
gadgetzanauctioneer.flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

grandcrusader.name: Grand Crusader
grandcrusader.description: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
grandcrusader.flavorText: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

heraldvolazj.name: Herald Volazj
heraldvolazj.description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
heraldvolazj.flavorText: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

hogger.name: Hogger
hogger.description: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
hogger.flavorText: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

illidanstormrage.name: Illidan Stormrage
illidanstormrage.description: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
illidanstormrage.flavorText: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

justicartrueheart.name: Justicar Trueheart
justicartrueheart.description: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
justicartrueheart.flavorText: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

kidnapper.name: Kidnapper
kidnapper.description: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
kidnapper.flavorText: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

kodorider.name: Kodorider
kodorider.flavorText: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

lordofthearena.name: Lord of the Arena
lordofthearena.flavorText: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

masterjouster.name: Master Jouster
masterjouster.description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
masterjouster.flavorText: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

mogorschampion.name: Mogor's Champion
mogorschampion.description: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
mogorschampion.flavorText: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

muklatyrantofthevale.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
muklatyrantofthevale.description: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
muklatyrantofthevale.flavorText: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

mysteriouschallenger.name: Mysterious Challenger
mysteriouschallenger.description: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
mysteriouschallenger.flavorText: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

nerubianprophet.name: Nerubian Prophet
nerubianprophet.description: At the start of your turn, reduce this card'sCost by (1).

priestessofelune.name: Priestess of Elune
priestessofelune.description: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
priestessofelune.flavorText: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

recklessrocketeer.name: Reckless Rocketeer
recklessrocketeer.flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

renojackson.name: Reno Jackson
renojackson.description: Battlecry: If your deck contains no more than 1 of any card, fully heal your hero.
renojackson.flavorText: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

savannahhighmane.name: Savannah Highmane
savannahhighmane.flavorText: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

scalednightmare.name: Scaled Nightmare
scalednightmare.description: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
scalednightmare.flavorText: I like it because it scales.

seareaver.name: Sea Reaver
seareaver.description: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
seareaver.flavorText: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

sideshowspelleater.name: Sideshow Spelleater
sideshowspelleater.description: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.

skeramcultist.name: Skeram Cultist
skeramcultist.description: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
skeramcultist.flavorText: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

sunwalker.name: Sunwalker
sunwalker.flavorText: She doesnâ€™t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Donâ€™t worry!

sylvanaswindrunner.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
sylvanaswindrunner.description: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
sylvanaswindrunner.flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

templeenforcer.name: Temple Enforcer
templeenforcer.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
templeenforcer.flavorText: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

thebeast.name: The Beast
thebeast.description: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
thebeast.flavorText: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

theblackknight.name: The Black Knight
theblackknight.description: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
theblackknight.flavorText: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

themistcaller.name: The Mistcaller
themistcaller.description: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
themistcaller.flavorText: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

theskeletonknight.name: The Skeleton Knight
theskeletonknight.description: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
theskeletonknight.flavorText: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

thingfrombelow.name: Thing from Below
thingfrombelow.description: [x]TauntCosts (1) less for eachTotem you've summonedthis game.
thingfrombelow.flavorText: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

voidcrusher.name: Void Crusher
voidcrusher.description: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.

volcanicdrake.name: Volcanic Drake
volcanicdrake.description: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
volcanicdrake.flavorText: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

wilfredfizzlebang.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
wilfredfizzlebang.description: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
wilfredfizzlebang.flavorText:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.

*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

windfuryharpy.name: Windfury Harpy
windfuryharpy.flavorText: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

wobblingrunts.name: Wobbling Runts
wobblingrunts.flavorText: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.

arcanitereaper.name: Arcanite Reaper
arcanitereaper.flavorText: Noâ€¦ actually you should fear the Reaper.

assassinsblade.name: Assassin's Blade
assassinsblade.flavorText: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

doomhammer.name: Doomhammer
doomhammer.flavorText: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

tentaclesforarms.name: Tentacles for Arms
tentaclesforarms.description: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
tentaclesforarms.flavorText: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.flavorText: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

baneofdoom.name: Bane of Doom
baneofdoom.description: Deal 2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
baneofdoom.flavorText: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

blessedchampion.name: Blessed Champion
blessedchampion.flavorText: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.description: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.

brawl.name: Brawl
brawl.description: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
brawl.flavorText: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

cabaliststome.name: Cabalist's Tome
cabaliststome.description: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
cabaliststome.flavorText: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

dragonsbreath.name: Dragon's Breath
dragonsbreath.description: Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
dragonsbreath.flavorText: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

excavatedevil.name: Excavated Evil
excavatedevil.description: Deal 3 damage to all minions.Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
excavatedevil.flavorText: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!

explosiveshot.name: Explosive Shot
explosiveshot.description: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones.
explosiveshot.flavorText: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

flamelance.name: Flame Lance
flamelance.flavorText: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

forceofnature.name: Force of Nature
forceofnature.flavorText: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

holynova.name: Holy Nova
holynova.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
holynova.flavorText: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

holywrath.name: Holy Wrath
holywrath.description: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.

nourish.name: Nourish
nourish.description: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
nourish.flavorText: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

powerword:tentacles.name: Power Word: Tentacles
powerword:tentacles.flavorText: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer ofâ€¦ tentacles?

solemnvigil.name: Solemn Vigil
solemnvigil.description: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
solemnvigil.flavorText: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.

standagainstdarkness.name: Stand Against Darkness
standagainstdarkness.flavorText: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

starfall.name: Starfall
starfall.description: Choose One - Deal 5 damage to a minion; or 2 damage to all enemy minions.
starfall.flavorText: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

abomination.name: Abomination
abomination.description: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
abomination.flavorText: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

anubisathsentinel.name: Anubisath Sentinel
anubisathsentinel.description: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3/+3.
anubisathsentinel.flavorText: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.

azuredrake.name: Azure Drake
azuredrake.description: Spell Damage +1. Battlecry: Draw a card.
azuredrake.flavorText: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

biggamehunter.name: Big Game Hunter
biggamehunter.description: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
biggamehunter.flavorText: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

blackwingcorruptor.name: Blackwing Corruptor
blackwingcorruptor.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
blackwingcorruptor.flavorText: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

bootybaybodyguard.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
bootybaybodyguard.flavorText: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

captaingreenskin.name: Captain Greenskin
captaingreenskin.flavorText: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

clockworkknight.name: Clockwork Knight
clockworkknight.flavorText: It takes a lot to wind him up.

corruptedhealbot.name: Corrupted Healbot
corruptedhealbot.description: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.
corruptedhealbot.flavorText: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

crazedworshipper.name: Crazed Worshipper
crazedworshipper.description: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
crazedworshipper.flavorText: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

cultapothecary.name: Cult Apothecary
cultapothecary.description: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your hero.

darkironskulker.name: Dark Iron Skulker
darkironskulker.description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
darkironskulker.flavorText: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.

darkscalehealer.name: Darkscale Healer
darkscalehealer.description: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
darkscalehealer.flavorText: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

darkshirealchemist.name: Darkshire Alchemist
darkshirealchemist.flavorText: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

darkspeaker.name: Darkspeaker
darkspeaker.description: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
darkspeaker.flavorText: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

djinniofzephyrs.name: Djinni of Zephyrs
djinniofzephyrs.description: After you cast a spell on another friendly minion, cast a copy of it on this one.
djinniofzephyrs.flavorText: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.

doomguard.name: Doomguard
doomguard.description: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
doomguard.flavorText: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

dragonconsort.name: Dragon Consort
dragonconsort.description: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
dragonconsort.flavorText: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.

druidoftheclaw.name: Druid of the Claw
druidoftheclaw.description: Choose One - Charge; or +2 Health and Taunt.
druidoftheclaw.flavorText: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

etherealconjurer.name: Ethereal Conjurer
etherealconjurer.flavorText: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

facelessmanipulator.name: Faceless Manipulator
facelessmanipulator.description: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
facelessmanipulator.flavorText: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

fencreeper.name: Fen Creeper
fencreeper.flavorText: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

frostwolfwarlord.name: Frostwolf Warlord
frostwolfwarlord.description: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
frostwolfwarlord.flavorText: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

grimpatron.name: Grim Patron
grimpatron.description: Whenever this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
grimpatron.flavorText: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

gurubashiberserker.name: Gurubashi Berserker
gurubashiberserker.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.

hallazealtheascended.name: Hallazeal the Ascended
hallazealtheascended.description: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.

harrisonjones.name: Harrison Jones
harrisonjones.description: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
harrisonjones.flavorText: â€œThat belongs in the Hall of Explorers!â€

kvaldirraider.name: Kvaldir Raider
kvaldirraider.flavorText: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

leeroyjenkins.name: Leeroy Jenkins
leeroyjenkins.description: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
leeroyjenkins.flavorText: At least he has Angry Chicken.

muklaschampion.name: Mukla's Champion
muklaschampion.flavorText: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

nagaseawitch.name: Naga Sea Witch
nagaseawitch.flavorText: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

nexus-championsaraad.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
nexus-championsaraad.description: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
nexus-championsaraad.flavorText: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

nightblade.name: Nightblade
nightblade.description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
nightblade.flavorText: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

pitfighter.name: Pit Fighter
pitfighter.flavorText: What did the pits ever do to you?

princesshuhuran.name: Princess Huhuran
princesshuhuran.description: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle effect.
princesshuhuran.flavorText: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

psych-o-tron.name: Psych-o-Tron
psych-o-tron.flavorText: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

ramwrangler.name: Ram Wrangler
ramwrangler.description: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon arandom Beast.
ramwrangler.flavorText: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

recruiter.name: Recruiter
recruiter.description: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
recruiter.flavorText: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

servantofyogg-saron.name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
servantofyogg-saron.description: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
servantofyogg-saron.flavorText: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

shado-panrider.name: Shado-Pan Rider
shado-panrider.flavorText: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
shadowcaster.description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy     to your hand that costs (1).
shadowcaster.flavorText: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

silverhandknight.name: Silver Hand Knight
silverhandknight.flavorText: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

spitefulsmith.name: Spiteful Smith
spitefulsmith.flavorText: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

stampedingkodo.name: Stampeding Kodo
stampedingkodo.description: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
stampedingkodo.flavorText: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

starvingbuzzard.name: Starving Buzzard
starvingbuzzard.description: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
starvingbuzzard.flavorText: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

stormpikecommando.name: Stormpike Commando
stormpikecommando.flavorText: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

stranglethorntiger.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
stranglethorntiger.flavorText: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

summoningstone.name: Summoning Stone
summoningstone.description: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
summoningstone.flavorText: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

thunderbluffvaliant.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
thunderbluffvaliant.flavorText: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

tundrarhino.name: Tundra Rhino
tundrarhino.flavorText: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

tuskarrjouster.name: Tuskarr Jouster
tuskarrjouster.description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
tuskarrjouster.flavorText: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

twilightdarkmender.name: Twilight Darkmender
twilightdarkmender.description: Battlecry: If your C'Thun  has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
twilightdarkmender.flavorText: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

usherofsouls.name: Usher of Souls
usherofsouls.description: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1(wherever it is).
usherofsouls.flavorText: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

validateddoomsayer.name: Validated Doomsayer
validateddoomsayer.description: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
validateddoomsayer.flavorText: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. Butâ€¦ he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

venturecomercenary.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
venturecomercenary.flavorText: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

chargedhammer.name: Charged Hammer
chargedhammer.description: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
chargedhammer.flavorText: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

poisonedblade.name: Poisoned Blade
poisonedblade.description: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
poisonedblade.flavorText: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

truesilverchampion.name: Truesilver Champion
truesilverchampion.description: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
truesilverchampion.flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

astralcommunion.name: Astral Communion
astralcommunion.description: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
astralcommunion.flavorText: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.

bladeflurry.name: Blade Flurry
bladeflurry.description: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
bladeflurry.flavorText: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

blessingofkings.name: Blessing of Kings
blessingofkings.flavorText: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

coneofcold.name: Cone of Cold
coneofcold.description: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
coneofcold.flavorText: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

consecration.name: Consecration
consecration.flavorText: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

fistofjaraxxus.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
fistofjaraxxus.description: When you play or discard this, deal 4 damage to a random enemy.

hammerofwrath.name: Hammer of Wrath
hammerofwrath.flavorText: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

hellfire.name: Hellfire
hellfire.flavorText: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

massdispel.name: Mass Dispel
massdispel.description: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
massdispel.flavorText: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

mindgames.name: Mindgames
mindgames.description: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
mindgames.flavorText: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

mortalstrike.name: Mortal Strike
mortalstrike.description: Deal 4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 6 instead.
mortalstrike.flavorText: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

multi-shot.name: Multi-Shot
multi-shot.description: Deal 3 damage to two random enemy minions.

polymorph.name: Polymorph
polymorph.description: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
polymorph.flavorText: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

shadowmadness.name: Shadow Madness
shadowmadness.description: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
shadowmadness.flavorText: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

shadowword:horror.name: Shadow Word: Horror
shadowword:horror.description: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
shadowword:horror.flavorText: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

shadowflame.name: Shadowflame
shadowflame.description: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
shadowflame.flavorText: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

souloftheforest.name: Soul of the Forest
souloftheforest.description: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."

swipe.name: Swipe
swipe.description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.
swipe.flavorText: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

ancientbrewmaster.name: Ancient Brewmaster
ancientbrewmaster.description: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
ancientbrewmaster.flavorText: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

ancientmage.name: Ancient Mage
ancientmage.description: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
ancientmage.flavorText: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

ancientshade.name: Ancient Shade
ancientshade.description: Battlecry: Shuffle an 'Ancient Curse' into your deck that deals 7 damage to you when drawn.
ancientshade.flavorText: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.

animatedarmor.name: Animated Armor
animatedarmor.description: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
animatedarmor.flavorText: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.

arathiweaponsmith.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
arathiweaponsmith.flavorText: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

armoredwarhorse.name: Armored Warhorse
armoredwarhorse.description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
armoredwarhorse.flavorText: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

auchenaisoulpriest.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
auchenaisoulpriest.description: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
auchenaisoulpriest.flavorText: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

axeflinger.name: Axe Flinger
axeflinger.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
axeflinger.flavorText: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

blackwaterpirate.name: Blackwater Pirate
blackwaterpirate.flavorText: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

bloodhoofbrave.name: Bloodhoof Brave
bloodhoofbrave.flavorText: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

chillwindyeti.name: Chillwind Yeti
chillwindyeti.flavorText: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

corerager.name: Core Rager
corerager.description: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
corerager.flavorText: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.

crowdfavorite.name: Crowd Favorite
crowdfavorite.description: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.

cthunschosen.name: C'Thun's Chosen
cthunschosen.description: [x]Divine ShieldBattlecry: Give your C'Thun+2/+2 (wherever it is).
cthunschosen.flavorText: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

cultmaster.name: Cult Master
cultmaster.description: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
cultmaster.flavorText: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

cyclopianhorror.name: Cyclopian Horror
cyclopianhorror.description: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain      +1 Health for each enemy minion.
cyclopianhorror.flavorText: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

dalaranaspirant.name: Dalaran Aspirant
dalaranaspirant.flavorText: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

darkirondwarf.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
darkirondwarf.description: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
darkirondwarf.flavorText: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

defenderofargus.name: Defender of Argus
defenderofargus.description: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
defenderofargus.flavorText: You wouldnâ€™t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

dementedfrostcaller.name: Demented Frostcaller
dementedfrostcaller.description: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
dementedfrostcaller.flavorText: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

draeneitotemcarver.name: Draenei Totemcarver
draeneitotemcarver.description: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
draeneitotemcarver.flavorText: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

dragonkinsorcerer.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
dragonkinsorcerer.description: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
dragonkinsorcerer.flavorText: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".

dragonlingmechanic.name: Dragonling Mechanic
dragonlingmechanic.flavorText: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

dreadcorsair.name: Dread Corsair
dreadcorsair.description: Taunt. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
dreadcorsair.flavorText: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

dreadsteed.name: Dreadsteed
dreadsteed.flavorText: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

eaterofsecrets.name: Eater of Secrets
eaterofsecrets.description: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
eaterofsecrets.flavorText: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

eeriestatue.name: Eerie Statue
eeriestatue.description: Canâ€™t attack unless itâ€™s the only minion in the battlefield.
eeriestatue.flavorText: Don't blink!  Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.

elisestarseeker.name: Elise Starseeker
elisestarseeker.description: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey'   into your deck.
elisestarseeker.flavorText: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.

etherealarcanist.name: Ethereal Arcanist
etherealarcanist.description: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
etherealarcanist.flavorText: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

evilheckler.name: Evil Heckler
evilheckler.flavorText: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

facelessshambler.name: Faceless Shambler
facelessshambler.description: TauntBattlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
facelessshambler.flavorText: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Y'sera shaped."

fandralstaghelm.name: Fandral Staghelm
fandralstaghelm.description: Your Choose One cards have both effects combined.
fandralstaghelm.flavorText: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Treeâ€¦" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

fireguarddestroyer.name: Fireguard Destroyer
fireguarddestroyer.flavorText: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

frigidsnobold.name: Frigid Snobold
frigidsnobold.flavorText: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

gnomishinventor.name: Gnomish Inventor
gnomishinventor.flavorText: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

gorillabota-3.name: Gorillabot A-3
gorillabota-3.description: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
gorillabota-3.flavorText: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

gormoktheimpaler.name: Gormok the Impaler
gormoktheimpaler.description: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
gormoktheimpaler.flavorText: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

holychampion.name: Holy Champion
holychampion.description: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
holychampion.flavorText: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

hoodedacolyte.name: Hooded Acolyte
hoodedacolyte.description: Whenever a character is healed, give yourC'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
hoodedacolyte.flavorText: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

houndmaster.name: Houndmaster
houndmaster.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
houndmaster.flavorText: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

hungrydragon.name: Hungry Dragon
hungrydragon.description: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
hungrydragon.flavorText: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.

infestedtauren.name: Infested Tauren
infestedtauren.flavorText: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

infestedwolf.name: Infested Wolf
infestedwolf.flavorText: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

keeperofthegrove.name: Keeper of the Grove
keeperofthegrove.description: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
keeperofthegrove.flavorText: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

keeperofuldaman.name: Keeper of Uldaman
keeperofuldaman.description: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
keeperofuldaman.flavorText: U da man!  No, U da man!

klaxxiamber-weaver.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
klaxxiamber-weaver.description: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
klaxxiamber-weaver.flavorText: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

korkronelite.name: Kor'kron Elite
korkronelite.flavorText: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

lightspawn.name: Lightspawn
lightspawn.description: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
lightspawn.flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

magnatauralpha.name: Magnataur Alpha
magnatauralpha.description: Also damages the minions next to whomeverhe attacks.
magnatauralpha.flavorText: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

maidenofthelake.name: Maiden of the Lake
maidenofthelake.flavorText: Not a good basis for a system of government.

masterofdisguise.name: Master of Disguise
masterofdisguise.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
masterofdisguise.flavorText: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

masterofevolution.name: Master of Evolution
masterofevolution.description: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
masterofevolution.flavorText: Will be really useful in the new "HearthÃ©mon" game.

midnightdrake.name: Midnight Drake
midnightdrake.description: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other cardin your hand.

mirekeeper.name: Mire Keeper
mirekeeper.description: [x]Choose One -Summon a2/2 Slime; or Gain anempty Mana Crystal.
mirekeeper.flavorText:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
"No.  I'm keeping it."

mogushanwarden.name: Mogu'shan Warden
mogushanwarden.flavorText: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

murlocknight.name: Murloc Knight
murlocknight.flavorText: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

oasissnapjaw.name: Oasis Snapjaw
oasissnapjaw.flavorText: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

ogremagi.name: Ogre Magi
ogremagi.flavorText: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

pitlord.name: Pit Lord
pitlord.description: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
pitlord.flavorText: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

pollutedhoarder.name: Polluted Hoarder
pollutedhoarder.flavorText: Roll â€˜greedâ€™ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

refreshmentvendor.name: Refreshment Vendor
refreshmentvendor.description: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
refreshmentvendor.flavorText: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

rumblingelemental.name: Rumbling Elemental
rumblingelemental.description: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

savagecombatant.name: Savage Combatant
savagecombatant.description: Inspire: Give your hero+2 Attack this turn.
savagecombatant.flavorText: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

senjinshieldmasta.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
senjinshieldmasta.flavorText: Sen'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

shiftingshade.name: Shifting Shade
shiftingshade.description: Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
shiftingshade.flavorText: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

silvermoonguardian.name: Silvermoon Guardian
silvermoonguardian.flavorText: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didnâ€™t go so wellâ€¦

southseasquidface.name: Southsea Squidface
southseasquidface.flavorText: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

spawnofshadows.name: Spawn of Shadows
spawnofshadows.description: Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
spawnofshadows.flavorText: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

spellbreaker.name: Spellbreaker
spellbreaker.flavorText: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

stormwindknight.name: Stormwind Knight
stormwindknight.flavorText: They're still embarassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

summoningportal.name: Summoning Portal
summoningportal.description: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
summoningportal.flavorText: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

tombpillager.name: Tomb Pillager
tombpillager.description: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
tombpillager.flavorText: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

tombspider.name: Tomb Spider
tombspider.flavorText: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.

tournamentmedic.name: Tournament Medic
tournamentmedic.description: Inspire: Restore 2 Health to your hero.
tournamentmedic.flavorText: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

twilightdrake.name: Twilight Drake
twilightdrake.description: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
twilightdrake.flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

twilightguardian.name: Twilight Guardian
twilightguardian.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
twilightguardian.flavorText: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

twilightsummoner.name: Twilight Summoner
twilightsummoner.flavorText: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

violetteacher.name: Violet Teacher
violetteacher.description: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
violetteacher.flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

waterelemental.name: Water Elemental
waterelemental.description: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
waterelemental.flavorText: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

wildwalker.name: Wildwalker
wildwalker.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3 Health.
wildwalker.flavorText: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

windspeaker.name: Windspeaker
windspeaker.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
windspeaker.flavorText: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

xarilpoisonedmind.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
xarilpoisonedmind.description: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
xarilpoisonedmind.flavorText: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

eaglehornbow.name: Eaglehorn Bow
eaglehornbow.description: Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
eaglehornbow.flavorText: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

kingsdefender.name: King's Defender
kingsdefender.description: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt,  gain +1 Durability.
kingsdefender.flavorText: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

perditionsblade.name: Perdition's Blade
perditionsblade.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
perditionsblade.flavorText: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

rallyingblade.name: Rallying Blade
rallyingblade.description: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
rallyingblade.flavorText: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

swordofjustice.name: Sword of Justice
swordofjustice.description: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
swordofjustice.flavorText: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

animalcompanion.name: Animal Companion
animalcompanion.flavorText: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

arcaneintellect.name: Arcane Intellect
arcaneintellect.flavorText: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

bash.name: Bash
bash.flavorText: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

beneaththegrounds.name: Beneath the Grounds
beneaththegrounds.description: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
beneaththegrounds.flavorText: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

bloodwarriors.name: Blood Warriors
bloodwarriors.description: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
bloodwarriors.flavorText: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

burgle.name: Burgle
burgle.description: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
charge.flavorText: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

counterspell.name: Counterspell
counterspell.description: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
counterspell.flavorText: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

deadlyshot.name: Deadly Shot
deadlyshot.flavorText: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

demonwrath.name: Demonwrath
demonwrath.description: Deal 2 damage to all non-Demon minions.
demonwrath.flavorText: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

divinefavor.name: Divine Favor
divinefavor.description: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
divinefavor.flavorText: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

drainlife.name: Drain Life
drainlife.description: Deal 2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
drainlife.flavorText: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

effigy.name: Effigy
effigy.description: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.

elementaldestruction.name: Elemental Destruction
elementaldestruction.description: Deal 4-5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5),
elementaldestruction.flavorText: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

fanofknives.name: Fan of Knives
fanofknives.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
fanofknives.flavorText: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

farsight.name: Far Sight
farsight.description: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
farsight.flavorText: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

feralrage.name: Feral Rage
feralrage.description: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
feralrage.flavorText: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

feralspirit.name: Feral Spirit
feralspirit.description: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
feralspirit.flavorText: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

forgottentorch.name: Forgotten Torch
forgottentorch.description: Deal 3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
forgottentorch.flavorText: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.

frostnova.name: Frost Nova
frostnova.flavorText: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

headcrack.name: Headcrack
headcrack.description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
headcrack.flavorText: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

healingwave.name: Healing Wave
healingwave.description: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
healingwave.flavorText: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
hex.flavorText: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

icebarrier.name: Ice Barrier
icebarrier.description: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
icebarrier.flavorText: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

iceblock.name: Ice Block
iceblock.description: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
iceblock.flavorText: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

infest.name: Infest
infest.description: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
infest.flavorText: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Errâ€¦ corpse.

killcommand.name: Kill Command
killcommand.description: Deal 3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.

lavaburst.name: Lava Burst
lavaburst.flavorText: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

lightningstorm.name: Lightning Storm
lightningstorm.description: Deal 2-3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
lightningstorm.flavorText: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

markofnature.name: Mark of Nature
markofnature.description: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
markofnature.flavorText: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

mirrorentity.name: Mirror Entity
mirrorentity.description: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
mirrorentity.flavorText: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

mulch.name: Mulch
mulch.description: Destroy a minion.Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
mulch.flavorText: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

polymorph:boar.name: Polymorph: Boar
polymorph:boar.description: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.

powershot.name: Powershot
powershot.description: Deal 2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.

savageroar.name: Savage Roar
savageroar.description: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
savageroar.flavorText: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

sealofchampions.name: Seal of Champions
sealofchampions.description: Give a minion+3 Attack and Divine Shield.

sensedemons.name: Sense Demons
sensedemons.description: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.
sensedemons.flavorText: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you donâ€™t need a spell to sense them.

shadowbolt.name: Shadow Bolt
shadowbolt.flavorText: Itâ€™s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

shadowstrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowstrike.description: Deal 5 damage to an undamaged character.
shadowstrike.flavorText: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

shadowword:death.name: Shadow Word: Death
shadowword:death.description: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.
shadowword:death.flavorText: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

shadowform.name: Shadowform
shadowform.description: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
shadowform.flavorText: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowformâ€¦ do they cast a shadow?

shieldblock.name: Shield Block
shieldblock.flavorText: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

spellbender.name: Spellbender
spellbender.description: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
spellbender.flavorText: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

spreadingmadness.name: Spreading Madness
spreadingmadness.description: Deal 9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
spreadingmadness.flavorText: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

thoughtsteal.name: Thoughtsteal
thoughtsteal.description: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand.
thoughtsteal.flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

unleashthehounds.name: Unleash the Hounds
unleashthehounds.description: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
unleashthehounds.flavorText: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

vaporize.name: Vaporize
vaporize.description: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
vaporize.flavorText: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

acolyteofpain.name: Acolyte of Pain
acolyteofpain.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
acolyteofpain.flavorText: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didnâ€™t work out like he thought they would.

addledgrizzly.name: Addled Grizzly
addledgrizzly.description: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
addledgrizzly.flavorText: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

alarm-o-bot.name: Alarm-o-Bot
alarm-o-bot.description: At the start of your turn, swap this minion with a random one in your hand.

aldorpeacekeeper.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
aldorpeacekeeper.description: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
aldorpeacekeeper.flavorText: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

arcanegolem.name: Arcane Golem
arcanegolem.description: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
arcanegolem.flavorText: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

blackwingtechnician.name: Blackwing Technician
blackwingtechnician.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
blackwingtechnician.flavorText: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!

bloodknight.name: Blood Knight
bloodknight.description: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
bloodknight.flavorText: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

bloodsailcultist.name: Bloodsail Cultist
bloodsailcultist.description: Battlecry: If you control a Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
bloodsailcultist.flavorText: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

brannbronzebeard.name: Brann Bronzebeard
brannbronzebeard.flavorText: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

coldlightoracle.name: Coldlight Oracle
coldlightoracle.flavorText: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

coldlightseer.name: Coldlight Seer
coldlightseer.description: Battlecry: Give ALL other Murlocs +2 Health.
coldlightseer.flavorText: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

coliseummanager.name: Coliseum Manager
coliseummanager.description: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
coliseummanager.flavorText: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

dalaranmage.name: Dalaran Mage
dalaranmage.flavorText: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

darkshirecouncilman.name: Darkshire Councilman
darkshirecouncilman.description: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.

demolisher.name: Demolisher
demolisher.description: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
demolisher.flavorText: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

desertcamel.name: Desert Camel
desertcamel.description: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
desertcamel.flavorText: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.

discipleofcthun.name: Disciple of C'Thun
discipleofcthun.description: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
discipleofcthun.flavorText: Câ€™Thunâ€™s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why itâ€™s the most popular Old God.

dragonhawkrider.name: Dragonhawk Rider
dragonhawkrider.flavorText: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

dreadscale.name: Dreadscale
dreadscale.description: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
dreadscale.flavorText: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

druidoftheflame.name: Druid of the Flame
druidoftheflame.description: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
druidoftheflame.flavorText: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.

earthenringfarseer.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
earthenringfarseer.flavorText: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

edwinvancleef.name: Edwin VanCleef
edwinvancleef.description: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
edwinvancleef.flavorText: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

emperorcobra.name: Emperor Cobra
emperorcobra.description: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
emperorcobra.flavorText: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

eydisdarkbane.name: Eydis Darkbane
eydisdarkbane.description: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

felguard.name: Felguard
felguard.description: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
felguard.flavorText: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

fencingcoach.name: Fencing Coach
fencingcoach.description: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
fencingcoach.flavorText: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

fjolalightbane.name: Fjola Lightbane
fjolalightbane.description: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.

flamewaker.name: Flamewaker
flamewaker.description: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flamewaker.flavorText: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they donâ€™t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

flesheatingghoul.name: Flesheating Ghoul
flesheatingghoul.description: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flesheatingghoul.flavorText: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

forlornstalker.name: Forlorn Stalker
forlornstalker.description: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
