forlornstalker.flavorText: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

frothingberserker.name: Frothing Berserker
frothingberserker.description: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
frothingberserker.flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

harvestgolem.name: Harvest Golem
harvestgolem.flavorText: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

icerager.name: Ice Rager
icerager.flavorText: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

impgangboss.name: Imp Gang Boss
impgangboss.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
impgangboss.flavorText: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

impmaster.name: Imp Master
impmaster.description: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.
impmaster.flavorText: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

injuredblademaster.name: Injured Blademaster
injuredblademaster.flavorText: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

ironbeakowl.name: Ironbeak Owl
ironbeakowl.flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

junglepanther.name: Jungle Panther
junglepanther.flavorText: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

kingmukla.name: King Mukla
kingmukla.flavorText: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

kirintormage.name: Kirin Tor Mage
kirintormage.description: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
kirintormage.flavorText: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

lightschampion.name: Light's Champion
lightschampion.flavorText: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

magmarager.name: Magma Rager
magmarager.flavorText: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

manatidetotem.name: Mana Tide Totem
manatidetotem.description: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
manatidetotem.flavorText: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

masterofceremonies.name: Master of Ceremonies
masterofceremonies.description: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.

mindcontroltech.name: Mind Control Tech
mindcontroltech.description: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
mindcontroltech.flavorText: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

murlocwarleader.name: Murloc Warleader
murlocwarleader.flavorText: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

orgrimmaraspirant.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
orgrimmaraspirant.flavorText: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

questingadventurer.name: Questing Adventurer
questingadventurer.description: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
questingadventurer.flavorText: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

ragingworgen.name: Raging Worgen
ragingworgen.flavorText: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

ravagingghoul.name: Ravaging Ghoul
ravagingghoul.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
ravagingghoul.flavorText: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

razorfenhunter.name: Razorfen Hunter
razorfenhunter.flavorText: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

saboteur.name: Saboteur
saboteur.description: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
saboteur.flavorText: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

scarletcrusader.name: Scarlet Crusader
scarletcrusader.flavorText: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

shadowfiend.name: Shadowfiend
shadowfiend.description: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
shadowfiend.flavorText: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

shadydealer.name: Shady Dealer
shadydealer.description: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
shadydealer.flavorText: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

shatteredsuncleric.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
shatteredsuncleric.flavorText: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drinkâ„¢!

si:7agent.name: SI:7 Agent
si:7agent.flavorText: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

silentknight.name: Silent Knight
silentknight.flavorText: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

silithidswarmer.name: Silithid Swarmer
silithidswarmer.description: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
silithidswarmer.flavorText: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

silverhandregent.name: Silver Hand Regent
silverhandregent.description: Inspire: Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.
silverhandregent.flavorText: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

silverbackpatriarch.name: Silverback Patriarch
silverbackpatriarch.flavorText: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

southseacaptain.name: Southsea Captain
southseacaptain.flavorText: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

spawnofnzoth.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
spawnofnzoth.flavorText: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

spellslinger.name: Spellslinger
spellslinger.description: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
spellslinger.flavorText: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

squirmingtentacle.name: Squirming Tentacle
squirmingtentacle.flavorText: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

stablemaster.name: Stablemaster
stablemaster.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
stablemaster.flavorText: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

stewardofdarkshire.name: Steward of Darkshire
stewardofdarkshire.description: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
stewardofdarkshire.flavorText: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

taurenwarrior.name: Tauren Warrior
taurenwarrior.flavorText: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

thrallmarfarseer.name: Thrallmar Farseer
thrallmarfarseer.flavorText: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

tinkmasteroverspark.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
tinkmasteroverspark.description: Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
tinkmasteroverspark.flavorText: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

tuskarrtotemic.name: Tuskarr Totemic
tuskarrtotemic.flavorText: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

twilightelder.name: Twilight Elder
twilightelder.description: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
twilightelder.flavorText: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

twilightflamecaller.name: Twilight Flamecaller
twilightflamecaller.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
twilightflamecaller.flavorText: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

unboundelemental.name: Unbound Elemental
unboundelemental.description: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
unboundelemental.flavorText: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

unearthedraptor.name: Unearthed Raptor
unearthedraptor.description: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle effect.
unearthedraptor.flavorText: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.

voidterror.name: Void Terror
voidterror.description: Battlecry: Destroy the minions on either side of this minion and gain their Attack and Health.
voidterror.flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

warhorsetrainer.name: Warhorse Trainer
warhorsetrainer.description: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
warhorsetrainer.flavorText: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

warsongcommander.name: Warsong Commander
warsongcommander.flavorText: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

wolfrider.name: Wolfrider
wolfrider.flavorText: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

argentlance.name: Argent Lance
argentlance.description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
argentlance.flavorText: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

fierywaraxe.name: Fiery War Axe
fierywaraxe.flavorText: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

alightinthedarkness.name: A Light in the Darkness
alightinthedarkness.flavorText: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while itâ€™s dark, doesnâ€™t that mean itâ€™s no longer dark?

ancestralspirit.name: Ancestral Spirit
ancestralspirit.description: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
ancestralspirit.flavorText: It was just a flesh wound.

arcaneexplosion.name: Arcane Explosion
arcaneexplosion.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
arcaneexplosion.flavorText: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

battlerage.name: Battle Rage
battlerage.description: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
battlerage.flavorText: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

beartrap.name: Bear Trap
beartrap.description: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
beartrap.flavorText: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

betrayal.name: Betrayal
betrayal.description: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
betrayal.flavorText: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

bolster.name: Bolster
bolster.flavorText: The best offense is a good defense.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions.
cleave.flavorText: Hey you twoâ€¦could you stand next to each other for a secondâ€¦

commandingshout.name: Commanding Shout
commandingshout.description: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
commandingshout.flavorText: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

confuse.name: Confuse
confuse.description: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.

convert.name: Convert
convert.description: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.

curseofrafaam.name: Curse of Rafaam
curseofrafaam.description: Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.While they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
curseofrafaam.flavorText: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.

darttrap.name: Dart Trap
darttrap.description: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
darttrap.flavorText: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!

demonfire.name: Demonfire
demonfire.description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If itâ€™s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
demonfire.flavorText: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

demonfuse.name: Demonfuse
demonfuse.description: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
demonfuse.flavorText: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

divinespirit.name: Divine Spirit
divinespirit.flavorText: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

embracetheshadow.name: Embrace the Shadow
embracetheshadow.description: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
embracetheshadow.flavorText: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

equality.name: Equality
equality.description: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
equality.flavorText: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.description: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Deal 4 damage instead.
eviscerate.flavorText: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

explorershat.name: Explorer's Hat
explorershat.description: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
explorershat.flavorText: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

explosivetrap.name: Explosive Trap
explosivetrap.description: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
explosivetrap.flavorText: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

flare.name: Flare
flare.description: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
flare.flavorText: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

freezingtrap.name: Freezing Trap
freezingtrap.description: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand and it costs (2) more.
freezingtrap.flavorText: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
frostbolt.description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
frostbolt.flavorText: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

gangup.name: Gang Up
gangup.description: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
gangup.flavorText: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

heroicstrike.name: Heroic Strike
heroicstrike.description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
heroicstrike.flavorText: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

holylight.name: Holy Light
holylight.flavorText: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

lavashock.name: Lava Shock
lavashock.description: Deal 2 damage.Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
lavashock.flavorText: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.

lockandload.name: Lock and Load
lockandload.description: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
lockandload.flavorText:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."

This card pays homage to that special moment.

markofthewild.name: Mark of the Wild
markofthewild.description: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)
markofthewild.flavorText: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

markofyshaarj.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
markofyshaarj.description: Give a minion +2/+2.If it's a Beast, drawa card.
markofyshaarj.flavorText: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

mindblast.name: Mind Blast
mindblast.description: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
mindblast.flavorText: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

misdirection.name: Misdirection
misdirection.description: Secret: When a character attacks your hero, instead he attacks another random character.
misdirection.flavorText: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

powerofthewild.name: Power of the Wild
powerofthewild.description: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
powerofthewild.flavorText: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

quickshot.name: Quick Shot
quickshot.description: Deal 3 damage.If your hand is empty, draw a card.

renouncedarkness.name: Renounce Darkness
renouncedarkness.description: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.

resurrect.name: Resurrect
resurrect.description: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
resurrect.flavorText: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 3 damage instead.
revenge.flavorText: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

sap.name: Sap
sap.description: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.

shadowword:pain.name: Shadow Word: Pain
shadowword:pain.description: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
shadowword:pain.flavorText: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

slam.name: Slam
slam.description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
slam.flavorText: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

snaketrap.name: Snake Trap
snaketrap.description: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
snaketrap.flavorText: Why did it have to be snakes?

snipe.name: Snipe
snipe.description: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 4 damage to it.
snipe.flavorText: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

stormcrack.name: Stormcrack
stormcrack.description: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
stormcrack.flavorText: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

wildgrowth.name: Wild Growth
wildgrowth.flavorText: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

windfury.name: Windfury
windfury.flavorText: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
wrath.flavorText: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

alexstraszaschampion.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
alexstraszaschampion.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
alexstraszaschampion.flavorText: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

amaniberserker.name: Amani Berserker
amaniberserker.flavorText: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

ancientwatcher.name: Ancient Watcher
ancientwatcher.flavorText: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

argentprotector.name: Argent Protector
argentprotector.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
argentprotector.flavorText: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

argentwatchman.name: Argent Watchman
argentwatchman.description: Can't attack.Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
argentwatchman.flavorText: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

armorsmith.name: Armorsmith
armorsmith.description: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
armorsmith.flavorText: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

beckonerofevil.name: Beckoner of Evil
beckonerofevil.description: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).

bilefintidehunter.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
bilefintidehunter.description: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Taunt.
bilefintidehunter.flavorText: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

bloodmagethalnos.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
bloodmagethalnos.description: Spell Damage +1. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
bloodmagethalnos.flavorText: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

bloodsailraider.name: Bloodsail Raider
bloodsailraider.description: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
bloodsailraider.flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

bluegillwarrior.name: Bluegill Warrior
bluegillwarrior.flavorText: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

boneguardlieutenant.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
boneguardlieutenant.flavorText: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

crazedalchemist.name: Crazed Alchemist
crazedalchemist.description: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
crazedalchemist.flavorText: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

crueltaskmaster.name: Cruel Taskmaster
crueltaskmaster.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
crueltaskmaster.flavorText: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

cultsorcerer.name: Cult Sorcerer
cultsorcerer.description: [x]Spell Damage +1After you cast a spell,give your C'Thun +1/+1(wherever it is).
cultsorcerer.flavorText: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

cutpurse.name: Cutpurse
cutpurse.description: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
cutpurse.flavorText: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

darkpeddler.name: Dark Peddler
darkpeddler.flavorText: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!

darkshirelibrarian.name: Darkshire Librarian
darkshirelibrarian.description: Battlecry:Discard a random card. Deathrattle:Draw a card.
darkshirelibrarian.flavorText: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

darnassusaspirant.name: Darnassus Aspirant
darnassusaspirant.description: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.Deathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
darnassusaspirant.flavorText: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

defiasringleader.name: Defias Ringleader
defiasringleader.flavorText: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

direwolfalpha.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
direwolfalpha.flavorText: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
doomsayer.description: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
doomsayer.flavorText: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

druidofthesaber.name: Druid of the Saber
druidofthesaber.description: Choose One - Transform to gain Charge; or +1/+1 and Stealth.
druidofthesaber.flavorText: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

duskboar.name: Duskboar
duskboar.flavorText: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

eternalsentinel.name: Eternal Sentinel
eternalsentinel.description: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
eternalsentinel.flavorText: Just try to avoid eye contact.

faeriedragon.name: Faerie Dragon
faeriedragon.description: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
faeriedragon.flavorText: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

fallenhero.name: Fallen Hero
fallenhero.description: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.

flamejuggler.name: Flame Juggler
flamejuggler.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flamejuggler.flavorText: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

flametonguetotem.name: Flametongue Totem
flametonguetotem.flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

frostwolfgrunt.name: Frostwolf Grunt
frostwolfgrunt.flavorText: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

garrisoncommander.name: Garrison Commander
garrisoncommander.description: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
garrisoncommander.flavorText: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

hugetoad.name: Huge Toad
hugetoad.description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

jeweledscarab.name: Jeweled Scarab
jeweledscarab.flavorText: It's amazing what you can do with super glue!

kingselekk.name: King's Elekk
kingselekk.description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.

knifejuggler.name: Knife Juggler
knifejuggler.description: After you summon a minion, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
knifejuggler.flavorText: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

koboldgeomancer.name: Kobold Geomancer
koboldgeomancer.flavorText: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

lancecarrier.name: Lance Carrier
lancecarrier.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack.
lancecarrier.flavorText: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

lightwell.name: Lightwell
lightwell.description: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
lightwell.flavorText: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

lorewalkercho.name: Lorewalker Cho
lorewalkercho.description: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other playerâ€™s hand.
lorewalkercho.flavorText: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

madbomber.name: Mad Bomber
madbomber.description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
madbomber.flavorText: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

manaaddict.name: Mana Addict
manaaddict.description: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
manaaddict.flavorText: Sheâ€™s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

manawraith.name: Mana Wraith
manawraith.flavorText: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

masterswordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
masterswordsmith.description: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
masterswordsmith.flavorText: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

millhousemanastorm.name: Millhouse Manastorm
millhousemanastorm.description: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.

museumcurator.name: Museum Curator
museumcurator.flavorText: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.

natpagle.name: Nat Pagle
natpagle.description: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
natpagle.flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

natthedarkfisher.name: Nat, the Darkfisher
natthedarkfisher.description: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
natthedarkfisher.flavorText: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

noviceengineer.name: Novice Engineer
noviceengineer.flavorText: "Half of this class will not graduateâ€¦ since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

patientassassin.name: Patient Assassin
patientassassin.description: Stealth. Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
patientassassin.flavorText: Heâ€™s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

pint-sizedsummoner.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
pint-sizedsummoner.description: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
pint-sizedsummoner.flavorText: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

rivercrocolisk.name: River Crocolisk
rivercrocolisk.flavorText: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

scavenginghyena.name: Scavenging Hyena
scavenginghyena.description: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
scavenginghyena.flavorText: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

sorcerersapprentice.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
sorcerersapprentice.flavorText: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

sunfuryprotector.name: Sunfury Protector
sunfuryprotector.flavorText: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

tinyknightofevil.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
tinyknightofevil.description: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
tinyknightofevil.flavorText: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

totemgolem.name: Totem Golem
totemgolem.flavorText: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

twilightgeomancer.name: Twilight Geomancer
twilightgeomancer.flavorText: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

twistedworgen.name: Twisted Worgen
twistedworgen.flavorText: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We canâ€™t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

undercityhuckster.name: Undercity Huckster
undercityhuckster.description: Deathrattle: Add a random class card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
undercityhuckster.flavorText: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

undercityvaliant.name: Undercity Valiant
undercityvaliant.flavorText: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

wildpyromancer.name: Wild Pyromancer
wildpyromancer.description: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
wildpyromancer.flavorText: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

wrathguard.name: Wrathguard
wrathguard.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
wrathguard.flavorText: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

wyrmrestagent.name: Wyrmrest Agent
wyrmrestagent.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
wyrmrestagent.flavorText: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

youthfulbrewmaster.name: Youthful Brewmaster
youthfulbrewmaster.description: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
youthfulbrewmaster.flavorText: His youthful enthusiasm doesnâ€™t always equal excellence in his brews.   Donâ€™t drink the Mogu Stout!

cursedblade.name: Cursed Blade
cursedblade.description: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
cursedblade.flavorText: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.

lightsjustice.name: Light's Justice
lightsjustice.flavorText: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

arcaneblast.name: Arcane Blast
arcaneblast.description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.

arcanemissiles.name: Arcane Missiles
arcanemissiles.description: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
arcanemissiles.flavorText: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

arcaneshot.name: Arcane Shot
arcaneshot.flavorText: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

bestialwrath.name: Bestial Wrath
bestialwrath.description: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
bestialwrath.flavorText: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

blessingofmight.name: Blessing of Might
blessingofmight.flavorText: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

blessingofwisdom.name: Blessing of Wisdom
blessingofwisdom.description: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
blessingofwisdom.flavorText: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

bloodtoichor.name: Blood To Ichor
bloodtoichor.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
bloodtoichor.flavorText: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

claw.name: Claw
claw.description: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor.
claw.flavorText: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

coldblood.name: Cold Blood
coldblood.description: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
coldblood.flavorText: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

competitivespirit.name: Competitive Spirit
competitivespirit.description: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
competitivespirit.flavorText: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

conceal.name: Conceal
conceal.description: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
conceal.flavorText: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

corruption.name: Corruption
corruption.description: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
corruption.flavorText: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!

deadlypoison.name: Deadly Poison
deadlypoison.flavorText: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

divinestrength.name: Divine Strength
divinestrength.flavorText: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

earthshock.name: Earth Shock
earthshock.description: Silence a minion, then deal 1 damage to it.
earthshock.flavorText: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

evolve.name: Evolve
evolve.description: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
evolve.flavorText: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

eyeforaneye.name: Eye for an Eye
eyeforaneye.description: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
eyeforaneye.flavorText: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

forkedlightning.name: Forked Lightning
forkedlightning.description: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
forkedlightning.flavorText: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

frostshock.name: Frost Shock
frostshock.description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.

handofprotection.name: Hand of Protection
handofprotection.flavorText: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins donâ€™t know what it should be called anymore.

holysmite.name: Holy Smite
holysmite.flavorText: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

humility.name: Humility
humility.flavorText: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

huntersmark.name: Hunter's Mark
huntersmark.flavorText: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

icelance.name: Ice Lance
icelance.description: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal 4 damage instead.
icelance.flavorText: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

innerfire.name: Inner Fire
innerfire.description: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
innerfire.flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

journeybelow.name: Journey Below
journeybelow.flavorText: Don't stop believing there's something below.

lightningbolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightningbolt.flavorText: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

livingroots.name: Living Roots
livingroots.description: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
livingroots.flavorText: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

mindvision.name: Mind Vision
mindvision.description: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
mindvision.flavorText: I see what you did there.

mirrorimage.name: Mirror Image
mirrorimage.flavorText: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

mortalcoil.name: Mortal Coil
mortalcoil.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
mortalcoil.flavorText: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

naturalize.name: Naturalize
naturalize.description: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.

noblesacrifice.name: Noble Sacrifice
noblesacrifice.description: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.

onthehunt.name: On the Hunt
onthehunt.flavorText: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

poweroverwhelming.name: Power Overwhelming
poweroverwhelming.description: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
poweroverwhelming.flavorText: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

powerword:glory.name: Power Word: Glory
powerword:glory.description: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health toyour hero.
powerword:glory.flavorText: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

powerword:shield.name: Power Word: Shield
powerword:shield.description: Give a minion +2 Health.Draw a card.
powerword:shield.flavorText: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

primalfusion.name: Primal Fusion
primalfusion.description: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
primalfusion.flavorText: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

ravenidol.name: Raven Idol
ravenidol.description: Choose One -Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
ravenidol.flavorText: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothean Idol.

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.description: Secret: When one of your minions dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
redemption.flavorText: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  Itâ€™s a mystery!

repentance.name: Repentance
repentance.description: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
repentance.flavorText: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

rockbiterweapon.name: Rockbiter Weapon
rockbiterweapon.description: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
rockbiterweapon.flavorText: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

sacredtrial.name: Sacred Trial
sacredtrial.description: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.

savagery.name: Savagery
savagery.description: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
savagery.flavorText: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

shieldslam.name: Shield Slam
shieldslam.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
shieldslam.flavorText: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

sinisterstrike.name: Sinister Strike
sinisterstrike.description: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
sinisterstrike.flavorText: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

soulfire.name: Soulfire
soulfire.description: Deal 4 damage. Discard a random card.
soulfire.flavorText: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.description: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
tracking.flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

upgrade!.name: Upgrade!
upgrade!.description: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.flavorText: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

abusivesergeant.name: Abusive Sergeant
abusivesergeant.description: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
abusivesergeant.flavorText: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

angrychicken.name: Angry Chicken
angrychicken.flavorText: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

argentsquire.name: Argent Squire
argentsquire.flavorText: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

bladedcultist.name: Bladed Cultist
bladedcultist.flavorText: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

bloodimp.name: Blood Imp
bloodimp.description: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
bloodimp.flavorText: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

bloodsailcorsair.name: Bloodsail Corsair
bloodsailcorsair.description: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
bloodsailcorsair.flavorText: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

bravearcher.name: Brave Archer
bravearcher.description: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
buccaneer.description: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
buccaneer.flavorText: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

dragonegg.name: Dragon Egg
dragonegg.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
dragonegg.flavorText: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.

dustdevil.name: Dust Devil
dustdevil.flavorText: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

elvenarcher.name: Elven Archer
elvenarcher.flavorText: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

fierybat.name: Fiery Bat
fierybat.description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

flameimp.name: Flame Imp
flameimp.description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flameimp.flavorText: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

forbiddenancient.name: Forbidden Ancient
forbiddenancient.description: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
forbiddenancient.flavorText: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

gadgetzanjouster.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
gadgetzanjouster.description: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
gadgetzanjouster.flavorText: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

goldshirefootman.name: Goldshire Footman
goldshirefootman.flavorText: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

grimscaleoracle.name: Grimscale Oracle
grimscaleoracle.flavorText: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesnâ€™t mean much.

hungrycrab.name: Hungry Crab
hungrycrab.description: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.

injuredkvaldir.name: Injured Kvaldir
injuredkvaldir.description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
injuredkvaldir.flavorText: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

lepergnome.name: Leper Gnome
lepergnome.description: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
lepergnome.flavorText: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

lightwarden.name: Lightwarden
lightwarden.description: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
lightwarden.flavorText: Sheâ€™s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

manawyrm.name: Mana Wyrm
manawyrm.description: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
manawyrm.flavorText: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

murlocraider.name: Murloc Raider
murlocraider.flavorText: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

murloctidecaller.name: Murloc Tidecaller
murloctidecaller.description: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.
murloctidecaller.flavorText: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

northshirecleric.name: Northshire Cleric
northshirecleric.description: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
northshirecleric.flavorText: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

nzothsfirstmate.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
nzothsfirstmate.flavorText: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

pitsnake.name: Pit Snake
pitsnake.description: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
pitsnake.flavorText: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.

possessedvillager.name: Possessed Villager
possessedvillager.flavorText: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

reliquaryseeker.name: Reliquary Seeker
reliquaryseeker.description: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
reliquaryseeker.flavorText: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.

secretkeeper.name: Secretkeeper
secretkeeper.description: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
secretkeeper.flavorText: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.

selflesshero.name: Selfless Hero
selflesshero.description: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
selflesshero.flavorText: "Don't worry about meâ€¦ I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
shieldbearer.flavorText: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

shifterzerus.name: Shifter Zerus
shifterzerus.description: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
shifterzerus.flavorText: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

sirfinleymrrgglton.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
sirfinleymrrgglton.description: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
sirfinleymrrgglton.flavorText: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.

southseadeckhand.name: Southsea Deckhand
southseadeckhand.description: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
southseadeckhand.flavorText: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

tentacleofnzoth.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
tentacleofnzoth.description: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
tentacleofnzoth.flavorText: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

timberwolf.name: Timber Wolf
timberwolf.flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

tournamentattendee.name: Tournament Attendee
tournamentattendee.flavorText: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

tunneltrogg.name: Tunnel Trogg
tunneltrogg.description: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
tunneltrogg.flavorText: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.

twilightwhelp.name: Twilight Whelp
twilightwhelp.description: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
twilightwhelp.flavorText: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

vilefininquisitor.name: Vilefin Inquisitor
vilefininquisitor.description: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a   1/1 Murloc.'

voidwalker.name: Voidwalker
voidwalker.flavorText: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

voodoodoctor.name: Voodoo Doctor
voodoodoctor.flavorText: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

worgeninfiltrator.name: Worgen Infiltrator
worgeninfiltrator.flavorText: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

youngdragonhawk.name: Young Dragonhawk
youngdragonhawk.flavorText: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

youngpriestess.name: Young Priestess
youngpriestess.description: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
youngpriestess.flavorText: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

zealousinitiate.name: Zealous Initiate
zealousinitiate.description: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
zealousinitiate.flavorText: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

ancestralhealing.name: Ancestral Healing
ancestralhealing.description: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
ancestralhealing.flavorText: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.
backstab.flavorText: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

forbiddenflame.name: Forbidden Flame
forbiddenflame.description: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
forbiddenflame.flavorText: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

forbiddenhealing.name: Forbidden Healing
forbiddenhealing.description: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
forbiddenhealing.flavorText: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

forbiddenritual.name: Forbidden Ritual
forbiddenritual.description: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
forbiddenritual.flavorText: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

forbiddenshaping.name: Forbidden Shaping
forbiddenshaping.description: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
forbiddenshaping.flavorText: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

innerrage.name: Inner Rage
innerrage.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
innerrage.flavorText: They're only smiling on the outside.

innervate.name: Innervate
innervate.description: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
innervate.flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

moonfire.name: Moonfire
moonfire.flavorText: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

preparation.name: Preparation
preparation.description: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.

sacrificialpact.name: Sacrificial Pact
sacrificialpact.description: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
sacrificialpact.flavorText: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
shadowstep.description: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
shadowstep.flavorText: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

silence.name: Silence
silence.flavorText: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

murloctinyfin.name: Murloc Tinyfin
murloctinyfin.flavorText: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

wisp.name: Wisp
wisp.flavorText: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?
